channel.title: 317 AxionPk Spawn-Eco Pk server
channel.description:
[center][CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/csyLNrL.png[/img]
[COLOR="#008080"]AxionPK is a server in development Martin, Jean Paul and David. We strive for a unique and enjoyable game, enhanced by great stability from our PI base. All content is made from scratch and will be perfected with time. Our developers work very hard to provide us with high-quality updates on a weekly basis to optimise the AxionPk experience for players.
Complete with 23 working skills, our server is suitable for all types of player! [/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2jbtut0.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.axionpk.com"]Homepage[/URL] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2jbtut0.png[/img][URL=http://"http://axionpk.com/playnow.html"]Webclient[/URL] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2jbtut0.png[/img][URL=http://"http://axionpk.com/playnow.html"]Download[/URL] [IMG]http://oi57.tinypic.com/nr0xlv.jpg[/img][URL=http://"http://www.axionpk.com/"]Forums[/URL]
